code: var useConfirm=function useConfirm(){var message=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"";var onConfirm=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var onCancel=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;if(onCancel&&typeof onCancel!=="function"){return;}if(onConfirm&&typeof onConfirm!=="function"){return;}var confirmAction=function confirmAction(){if(window.confirm(message)){onConfirm();}else{onCancel();}};return confirmAction;};export default useConfirm;
